## Checklist

### All Changes
- [ ] Code follows project style guidelines
- [ ] Self-review completed
- [ ] No new warnings or errors introduced

### Dataset Changes Only
- [ ] Schema validation passes (`npm run validate`)
- [ ] Minimum 2 reliable sources provided (add links in description or issue)
- [ ] International sources included where applicable (USA, Brazil, EU, China, Japan)

### API Changes Only
- [ ] Tests added/updated and passing
- [ ] No clippy warnings (`cargo clippy`)
- [ ] Code formatted (`cargo fmt`)

### Documentation Changes Only
- [ ] All links tested
- [ ] Code examples tested
- [ ] No content duplication (DRY principle followed)
